mapper.select: SELECT a.id AS awardId, a.award_year AS awardYear, NULLIF(NULLIF(a.award_date, ''), ' ') AS awardDate, a.contest_name AS contestName, a.award_name AS awardName, a.award_type AS awardType, a.organization, a.regdate AS regDate, a.moddate AS modDate FROM _sw_mileage_award AS a WHERE a.snum = #{studentId} ORDER BY a.award_year, a.award_date DESC;
